channel.title: Comments on: Easy Vegan Kale Mac & “Cheese” (AIP)

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/easy-vegan-kale-mac-and-cheese-aip/#comment-511">Annie</a>.
Hi Annie, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. I am thrilled to hear how much you enjoy the recipe - what an honor to be included in your meal rotation!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Annie.

Hi Annie, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. I am thrilled to hear how much you enjoy the recipe – what an honor to be included in your meal rotation!

item.title: By: Annie
item.dc:creator: Annie
item.description: This recipe is SUPER simple and doesn't require a lot of groceries ahead of time. I make it at least once weekly to go along with my new recipes. It's a tasty and creamy dish I can just make quickly to grab throughout the week. It's filling and nutrient-dense. I am so grateful Stephanie created it!
item.content:encoded: This recipe is SUPER simple and doesn’t require a lot of groceries ahead of time. I make it at least once weekly to go along with my new recipes. It’s a tasty and creamy dish I can just make quickly to grab throughout the week. It’s filling and nutrient-dense. I am so grateful Stephanie created it!
